html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04012018-04-03NR,  CRA,  ,  ,  , 
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Insurable Earnings and Collection of Premiums Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the INSURABLE EARNINGS AND COLLECTION OF PREMIUMS REGULATIONS in order to (1) exclude from insurable earnings top-ups to the benefits for family members who care for a critically ill adult and for parents of a critically ill child; (2) respect the intent that the benefits for family members caring for a critically ill adult and for parents of a critically ill child be administered in the same manner as the other special benefits; and (3) bridge the existing legislative gap since 2013 with respect to the benefits for parents of a critically ill child.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0071 Publication Date: 2018-04-18
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Insurable Earnings and Collection of Premiums Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the INSURABLE EARNINGS AND COLLECTION OF PREMIUMS REGULATIONS in order to (1) exclude from insurable earnings top-ups to the benefits for family members who care for a critically ill adult and for parents of a critically ill child; (2) respect the intent that the benefits for family members caring for a critically ill adult and for parents of a critically ill child be administered in the same manner as the other special benefits; and (3) bridge the existing legislative gap since 2013 with respect to the benefits for parents of a critically ill child.
